home.landingTitleP: Building Your Future on a Foundation of Excellence
home.landingText: In Garcia Global Construction we turn vision into reality. Specializing in high-quality construction services, we pride ourselves on creating spaces that not only meet but exceed our clients' expectations. From groundbreaking commercial projects to luxurious residential homes, our commitment to excellence and innovation has made us a leader in the construction industry.
home.ourSerivceText: Our mission is to deliver exceptional construction services by adhering to the highest standards of workmanship, safety, and sustainability. We aim to build long-lasting relationships with our clients, suppliers, and communities, contributing to their growth and prosperity.
home.ourServiceItemText1: Our mission is to deliver exceptional constructiuion services by adhering to the highest standards of workmanship
home.ourServiceItemText2: Our mission is to deliver exceptional constructiuion services by adhering to the highest standards of workmanship
home.ourServiceItemText3: Our mission is to deliver exceptional construction services by adhering.
home.ourServiceItemText4: Our mission is to deliver exceptional construction services by adhering to the.
home.ourServiceItemText5: Our mission is to deliver exceptional construction services by adhering to the highest  of workmanship.
home.aboutUsText: Garcia Global Construction began as a humble construction firm with a vision to create exceptional living spaces that stand the test of time. Over the years, we've expanded our services to include not just construction but also individual projecting, interior design, renovation, and more, making us a full-service firm dedicated to comprehensive luxury living solutions. Our projects, spanning from Marbella to Estepona, showcase our versatility and expertise in creating homes that are not just structures but sanctuaries.
home.aboutUsItemText1: In three countries, our projects stand as testaments to our adaptability and quality. From [Country 1] to [Country 3], we've tailored each project to blend with local landscapes while maintaining our high standards.
home.aboutUsItemText2: The past ten years have shaped us into leaders in construction, driving innovation and delivering spaces that inspire. This journey has been built on trust, collaboration, and a relentless pursuit of excellence.
home.aboutUsItemText3: With more than 60 projects across various sectors, we've proven our ability to meet diverse challenges and client needs. Each project is a reflection of our commitment to deliver excellence and satisfaction.
home.interirDesignText: Transforming interiors into masterpieces of comfort and style, we craft spaces that reflect the perfect balance between functionality and aesthetic appeal. Our expertise in interior design spans various environments, from luxurious homes to dynamic commercial spaces, ensuring each project not only meets but exceeds our clients' visions.

penthouseValencia.title: Penthouse Valencia
penthouseValencia.underTitle: Fully renovated penthouse on Valencia, Spain
penthouseValencia.text: This space is characterized by its clean, modern design, which seamlessly integrates elements of historical architecture. The emphasis is on simplicity and openness, with large windows inviting ample natural light that enhances the fusion of industrial and traditional materials. The overall feel is one of calm and clarity, offering a tranquil environment for living and working.

projectLoftLivingRoom.title: Project Loft Living Room
projectLoftLivingRoom.text: From the cozy nooks of The Urban Lounge to the lively buzz of The Industrial Chic Bar, and the adaptable layout of The Contemporary Commons, each area is thoughtfully designed to enhance your experience. Explore the dynamic blend of rustic charm and modern elegance in our establishment, where every corner is a testament to innovative design and meticulous attention to detail. Come in, and discover a place where every moment is worth savoring.

tranquilModernity.title: Tranquil Modernity
tranquilModernity.underTitle: Discover a sanctuary where modern design meets unmatched functionality
tranquilModernity.text: This living room blends modern design elements with functional technology, showcasing a seamless integration of media and comfort. The strategic use of space and built-in storage solutions emphasizes a clutter-free environment that champions modern living. Ambience: The ambience is one of calm and collected sophistication, with soft lighting and neutral colors promoting a relaxing and inviting space that encourages leisure and conversation

individualProjecting.title: INDIVIDUAL PROJECTING
individualProjecting.itemText1: In order to define the task during the meeting, we will jointly form a detailed specification based on your lifestyle and wishes.
individualProjecting.itemText2: In order to define the task during the meeting, we will jointly form a detailed specification based on your lifestyle and wishes.
individualProjecting.itemText3: After agreeing on the concept, we proceed with the development of the architectural and structural design.
individualProjecting.itemText4: During the meeting we will jointly form a detailed technical specification based on your lifestyle and wishes.

houseInteriorDesign.title: HOUSE INTERIOR DESIGN
houseInteriorDesign.text: A unique interior of a private cottage is a `visiting` card that your guests will immediately see. Thanks to modern technologies it is possible to beautifully and presentably design a large house, making it a real mansion, which will be unrivalled in design.   GARCIA DLOBAL specialists are professionals who create real masterpieces. You can order a villa project with a non-standard layout, interior design in a specific style or according to individual requirements. All calculations will be carried out within the declared norms and submitted for approval

videos.videoSubTitle1: Fully renovated penthouse on Albacete, Spain 2019
videos.videoText1: Take a step into a modern townhouse that pairs comfort with clean design. The spacious dining area opens up to a serene terrace, thanks to smooth sliding doors, inviting both light and leisure into your home. Natural wood surfaces and subtle lighting ensure the space feels warm and welcoming. Each piece of furniture is chosen for both its style and comfort, creating perfect spots for both rest and gatherings. This townhouse is designed with an eye for elegance and a focus on living well.
videos.videoAdvantage2: Warm wood finishes and neutral color
videos.videoAdvantage3: Comfortable, functional spaces for relaxation and entertainment
videos.videoAdvantage4: Terrace with privacy features for outdoor enjoyment
videos.videoText2: Take a step into a modern townhouse that pairs comfort with clean design. The spacious dining area opens up to a serene terrace, thanks to smooth sliding doors, inviting both light and leisure into your home. Natural wood surfaces and subtle lighting ensure the space feels warm and welcoming. Each piece of furniture is chosen for both its style and comfort, creating perfect spots for both rest and gatherings. This townhouse is designed with an eye for elegance and a focus on living well.

penthouseValencia.descr: This space is characterized by its clean, modern design, which seamlessly integrates elements of historical architecture. The emphasis is on simplicity and openness, with large windows inviting ample natural light that enhances the fusion of industrial and traditional materials. The overall feel is one of calm and clarity, offering a tranquil environment for living and working.
penthouseValencia.kitchenDescr: The open-plan kitchen and dining area blend functionality with sociable space. The clean lines of the cabinetry and uncluttered surfaces reflect a modern lifestyle, while the central dining table promises communal culinary experiences.
penthouseValencia.livingDescr: Elegance meets minimalism in this living room entry. The open doorway extends a warm invitation, revealing a space of calm neutrality, punctuated by thoughtful lighting and a glimpse of nature beyond the threshold.
penthouseValencia.terraceDescr: This terrace is a personal oasis, with a wooden screen providing a natural texture that complements the modern outdoor furnishings. It's an intimate corner for relaxation, illuminated by a soft glow that enhances the ambiance of peaceful solitude.

tranquilModernity.descr: This living room blends modern design elements with functional technology, showcasing a seamless integration of media and comfort. The strategic use of space and built-in storage solutions emphasizes a clutter-free environment that champions modern living. Ambience: The ambience is one of calm and collected sophistication, with soft lighting and neutral colors promoting a relaxing and inviting space that encourages leisure and conversation
tranquilModernity.kitchenDescr: The kitchen is designed with a focus on functionality and style, featuring a clean, open layout. It boasts state-of-the-art appliances integrated seamlessly into the cabinetry, maintaining the space's streamlined look. The long kitchen island doubles as a preparation area and a casual dining spot, complete with chic, upholstered stools. Overhead, elegant pendant lights illuminate the workspace, while the subtle tones of the cabinetry and countertops create a calm, inviting atmosphere.
tranquilModernity.livingDescr: The living room exudes a sleek, modern aesthetic characterized by its minimalist design and neutral color palette. Anchored by a plush, light gray sectional sofa, the space invites relaxation and socializing. Strategic lighting highlights architectural features and artwork, adding depth and warmth. A large, wall-mounted television serves as a focal point, while contemporary furnishings, including a stylish white chair and a compact coffee table, complement the room's sophisticated ambiance.
tranquilModernity.terraceDescr: This bathroom combines luxury and simplicity, creating a serene retreat. The vanity is modern and minimalistic, with under-cabinet lighting that provides a soft glow, enhancing the room’s tranquil feel. Above the sleek, rectangular sink, a large mirror spans the width of the vanity, reflecting light and visually expanding the space. Recessed shelves offer practical storage solutions without disrupting the bathroom's clean lines, making it not only beautiful but also highly functional.

projectLoftLivingRoom.architecturalFusion: Architectural Fusion: historical textures intertwined & comfort.
projectLoftLivingRoom.ambience: Ambience: welcoming atmosphere where natural elements soften urban edges
projectLoftLivingRoom.descr: From the cozy nooks of The Urban Lounge to the lively buzz of The Industrial Chic Bar, and the adaptable layout of The Contemporary Commons, each area is thoughtfully designed to enhance your experience. Explore the dynamic blend of rustic charm and modern elegance in our establishment, where every corner is a testament to innovative design and meticulous attention to detail. Come in, and discover a place where every moment is worth savoring.
projectLoftLivingRoom.kitchenDescr: The Urban Lounge combines the rustic charm of exposed brick walls with modern design elements to create a welcoming space. Comfortable blue sofas and lush green plants make this an ideal spot for casual meetings or relaxing after work. The incorporation of large windows floods the area with natural light, enhancing the warm ambiance.
projectLoftLivingRoom.livingDescr: This module features a stylish bar set against a backdrop of a luminous liquor display and exposed brick, embodying an industrial chic aesthetic. The long communal table, accented with modern bar stools, invites social interaction and serves as the social heart of the space. Strategic lighting above the bar highlights its sleek design and creates a vibrant atmosphere perfect for evening gatherings.
projectLoftLivingRoom.terraceDescr: The Contemporary Commons area is marked by its minimalist style and versatile seating arrangements, suitable for both work and leisure. The space is defined by clean lines, subdued colors, and functional furniture, making it perfect for client meetings or team collaborations. The presence of greenery adds a touch of freshness to the urban interior, while the expansive windows provide panoramic views of the urban surroundings.

flatInteriorDesign.title: FLAT INTERIOR DESIGN
flatInteriorDesign.kitchenDescr: A sleek and functional space dominated by dark, matte cabinetry and state-of-the-art appliances. The kitchen balances a modern aesthetic with practicality, featuring a clean, uncluttered countertop and subtle, integrated lighting that creates a warm glow. It’s a culinary workshop designed for efficiency and style.
flatInteriorDesign.bathroomDescr: Minimalist in design with a focus on clean lines and unadorned surfaces. The bathroom likely includes a walk-in shower, accented with either glass panels or discreet tiling, complemented by a simple, modern sink and vanity. The lighting is soft, ensuring a space that is both bright and inviting.
flatInteriorDesign.bedroomDescr: A sanctuary of rest, the bedroom exudes calm with a muted color palette and minimal furnishings. The focus is a comfortable bed with plush linens, set against a backdrop of tranquil art or texture. Functional bedside lighting and storage solutions are present, keeping the space neat and serene.
flatInteriorDesign.hallwayDescr: The hallway serves as a connector between rooms, characterized by its streamlined appearance. It may feature warm wood or cool tile flooring and is lit by a series of strategically placed lights that provide a welcoming path through the home.
flatInteriorDesign.diningAreaDescr: A gathering space that marries form and function, the dining area is likely home to a simple yet elegant table flanked by modern chairs. Overhead lighting, possibly a statement piece, centers the room, while the surrounding space remains uncluttered to keep the focus on the social experience of dining together.

constructionOfCottagesAndVillas.title: CONSTRUCTION COTTAGES AND VILLAS
constructionOfCottagesAndVillas.text: “Good buildings come from good people, and all problems are solved by good design.” – Stephen Gardiner

generalContractor.title: General contractor
generalContractor.text: As a general contractor, we manage construction projects from inception to completion, handling technical documentation, budgeting, scheduling, and subcontractor coordination. Our expertise ensures efficient project execution while prioritizing budget optimization, work safety, and client satisfaction.
generalContractor.item1: Development of technical documentation and budgeting
generalContractor.item4: Preparation of estimates and financing plan
generalContractor.item10: Preparation of estimates and financing plan

geodeticWorks.title: Geodetic works
geodeticWorks.item1: Development of technical documentation and budgeting

monolithicWorks.title: Monolithic works
monolithicWorks.item1: Zero-cycle works, as well as pile foundations
monolithicWorks.item2: Pouring of concrete industrial floor and trenches
monolithicWorks.item3: Pouring of foundations of any complexity and type

capitalConstruction.title: Capital Construction
capitalConstruction.item1: Preparation and obtaining of all permits for site development and construction, co-ordination with state authorities
capitalConstruction.item2: Site development - demolition of old buildings, rubbish removal, clearing for future construction
capitalConstruction.item3: Foundation pouring, erection of walls and floors, internal partitions, roof installation
capitalConstruction.item4: Cleaning in the premises and on the site, removal of construction waste from the territory of the facility
capitalConstruction.item5: Installation of all internal communications (heat, hydro, noise insulation, electricity, supply of engineering systems to the building)
capitalConstruction.item6: Exterior finishing of the house and landscaping of the site, commissioning, window and door installation

renovation.title: Renovation
renovation.item2: Replacement of water supply, sewerage and heating
renovation.item4: Installation of ventilation and air conditioning systems
renovation.item5: Installation of fire safety system, facade works, roofing works
renovation.item6: Installation of SCS, ACS, video surveillance

finishingWorks.title: Finishing works
finishingWorks.item2: Linoleum, PVC tiles, carpet, carpet tiles
finishingWorks.item4: Arrangement of tiles, granite, marble, porcelain tiles, mosaics
finishingWorks.item5: Ceramic, built-in, aluminium, MDF, MDF, PVC, carpet skirting boards
finishingWorks.item6: Installation of brick and block partitions
finishingWorks.item7: Installation of plasterboard constructions (partitions, false walls, boxes)
finishingWorks.item8: Machine plastering cement, cement-lime, gypsum plastering
finishingWorks.item9: Tiling, Filling openings (doors, windows, sliding systems)
finishingWorks.item10: Machine and manual painting, decorative plaster
finishingWorks.item13: Modular ceilings (Armstrong, Grillato) Slatted ceilings, Plasterboard ceiling

engineeringSystems.title: Engineering systems
engineeringSystems.item2: Laying of power and low-current cables
engineeringSystems.item7: Laying of power and low-current cables
